snippet: President Sheik Sharif Sheik Ahmed, left, has shielded a top pirate leader from arrest by issuing him a diplomatic passport, according to a United Nations investigation.
abstract: United Nations inquiry finds that President Sheik Sharif Sheik Ahmed of Somalia has shielded a top pirate leader, Mohamed Abdi Hassan, from arrest by issuing him a diplomatic passport.
lead_paragraph: President Sheik Sharif Sheik Ahmed, left, has shielded a top pirate leader from arrest by issuing him a diplomatic passport, according to a United Nations investigation.

headline.main: Somalia: President Is Shielding Pirate Leader, U.N. Report Says
headline.print_headline: Somalia: President Is Shielding Pirate Leader, U.N. Report Says
